name: Countdown Timer for Elementor
author: FlickDevs

sections.description:
Countdown Timer is an elementor add-on to showcase timer in a simple and flexible way. This plugin adds new elements/widgets to Elementor Page Builder.

Demo

Feel free to email us if you want any custom widget for your site. We are relaible and experienced in developing custom elementor widgets.

Note: This plugin is a widget of Elementor Page Builder (https://wordpress.org/plugins/elementor/) and will only work with Elementor Page Builder installed.

Try Countdown Timer Pro, the Best countdown timer for elementor, for $4.99

Countdown Timer Pro Create a sense of urgency to drive sales or conversions. Perfect for flash sales, event pages, special promotions, birthdays, weddings, one time offer, and more.

Countdown Timer Pro Features

  • Cookie based Timer
  • Resart Timer after Specific Time/ Repeat timer
  • Posts / Pages Countdown Timer
  • No coding skill required
  • Customize everything
  • Fully Responsive
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can I add multiple Countdown Timer Module with single page?

Yes, you can. Countdown Timer Module for elementor plugin gives you the ability to add multiple timer on same page. You just need to drag and drop that module multiple times wherever you want.

Can I change color or customize timer as per my wish?

Yes, You can customize it. We provided all possible options in backend to update it from default timer.

What next after timer completion?

There is an option available under ‘Countdown Expire’ where you can show message or redirect customer to another place after timer completion.
